website_summaries.verdict: The Griffin WoodTones Over-the-Ear Headphones offer solid audio performance in an affordable, alluring wooden design.
pros: High quality audio performance, with rich lows and crisp highs
Detachable cable with microphone and remote for mobile devices

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and within three months the over-ear speakers sheared off the head band. The sound was a little warm but really nice all the same. I might have given the product 4* if I'd reviewed earlier.
customer_reviews.author: David Thring

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: The first thing to say is that I have received two pairs of these headphones and both have broken within a few months of arrival. The reason I have given them 3 stars, is that everything other than their build quality is very impressive. The sound is good and the comfort levels are very good. If you live a very stationary and delicate existence they represent an extremely attractive option at their price point. Unfortunately for the user on the go, or even the user on the stroll, they are not built well enough to last. A great shame as I don't think I will be able to find something similar in the same price bracket.
customer_reviews.author: S J England

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but iPhone compatibility doesn't exist!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones where broke upon arrival, completely disconnected earpiece. Replacement was sent but I'm still disappointed with the product. The microphone stops working occasionally, i need to disconnect the headset then try again. The button is glitchy, play pause and skip work about 10% of the time. No volume control... All in all it's sounds great but iPhone compatibility doesn't exist!
customer_reviews.author: Jonny

customer_reviews.title: They fall apart
customer_reviews.text: The headset is very comfortable and good volume, however in just a few months you find out that the design is flawed, The ear assembly are attached to the head strap by a small screw that is holding the ear pieces. This is all all plastic and after awhile they just fall off. The fix was easy enough, Apply PVC glue and then seal with super glue. But still disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E Graham

customer_reviews.title: Cons outweigh the Pros
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look, feel, and sound of these headphones. However, they broke almost immediately. This is not the first time that I have bought this specific headphone set, they broke last time as well. i was hoping that the first breakage was just a fluke, but it seems that it is unfortunately a manufacturing issue. Sad about it, these were very slick otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best of its price range!
customer_reviews.text: This headphone represent an excellent value, surpassing by far competitive products out of its price range. While being not exactly a bass wonder, the neutrality is outstanding, clarity and Imaging being strong aspects. I give that a full heartedly recommendation!
customer_reviews.author: Lancelot

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality sound but not rouged enough. After using for two weeks one side of headphone broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel H.

customer_reviews.title: They look cool, but they are not good!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cheap. They look cool but they are not sturdy and break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be made cheaply. They broke within ...
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be made cheaply. They broke within the first month and I had treated them carefully. The sound was OK tho.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous headphoned
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and the most comfortable headphones I have ever had on... bar none!! I don't know if the wood helps the sound but they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, great fit. 2 stars because they broke 2 weeks after I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah E Nelson

customer_reviews.title: super dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these daily for a few weeks, and yesterday as i was removing them from my head, the earpiece popped off. super dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle White

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking. Sound Could Be Better.
customer_reviews.text: Overall sound is decent. I listen to a wide variety of music. They sound best with EDM, Acoustics, Vocals, Classical, and the like. The look is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for a big head :)
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a gift for my boyfriend, he loves them. However my head is smaller, and they look ridiculous on me...
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Read all the reviews and I have to say I am totally satisfied with my purchase. Excellent sound quality, and looks that get noticed. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: James Wittmann

customer_reviews.title: Wood over-ear phones
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Sister-in-law to use with her tablet. Funky wood, great sound, happy family.
customer_reviews.author: SixtyYearNerd

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones because I wanted to listen to music for hours and be comfortable. These headphones are one of the most comfortable ones that I have worn. I am not a sound expert, but I would say that the quality is excellent. It is hard to find comfy headphones under 100 bucks, so if you are looking for something comfy, these are for you. The only reason that I did not give it five stars is because the headphones are not the absolute best headphones in the world. Somewhere there are audiophile headphones that are better in sound quality and maybe in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Davis

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, horrible craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: As far as the sound quality is concerned, these are very nice headphones. I noticed good bass and treble response using these with my iphone. Additionally I find them very stylish and comfortable. However, there are some major problems here: these headphones don't travel well as they do not fit into many cases and griffin doesn't offer one of their own, and the headphones themselves do not fold down for storage, but that isn't the real issue here. Simply put, these are very cheaply made. I have purchased two pairs (one as a gift) and both pairs experienced a headphone snapping off from the headband over the course of mere weeks, simply due to everyday usage.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these headphones but they broke within a month during ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these headphones but they broke within a month during travel (and I take pretty good care of my things). I immediately bought another pair because I loved the sound and comfort so much, however those broke again too. If you aren't traveling with these headphones then they are GREAT but if you plan to take them anywhere be very careful.
customer_reviews.author: M Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds, but broke after light use. It's too bad, I would buy more but the quality is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: ccdc

customer_reviews.title: Look great but built to fail
customer_reviews.text: Same thing you'll find with most other reviews; look great, sound great, break in a matter of weeks through very light use and poor construction. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JHPO

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy and lightweight. Goegeous, rich sound. However... I should have heeded the other reviews - cheap, plastic construction causes the earpiece to break away from the headband, rendering them useless. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, shame about the build.
customer_reviews.text: They just keep breaking, and breaking, and breaking. I now have 3 broken pairs at home. I won't be getting that fourth.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but break easily
customer_reviews.text: These were the most comfortable headphones I've ever worn. However, both pairs I owned snapped within 6 months. I did wear them about 3 hours every day. Really wish they were hardier.
customer_reviews.author: charsuede

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Headphones broke very easily. I was very careful and gentle with them, in fact they never left my house and one day the ear part just snapped off.
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: Wood you like a neutral pair of cans?
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these very well made and a little unusual headphones. The sound is very neutral throughout the range. They sound is open and clear and the comfort is amazing!! If your after thumping bass and over bright treble you might be disappointed! However if you appreciate a pair of cans that provide you with an essentially neutral sound that you could listen to all day then these are for you!! I loved the sound and comfort so much I bought a second pair!! If that's not a recommendation I don't know what is!!
customer_reviews.author: Starslider

customer_reviews.title: Shame as they sounded pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Yep got these and stretched the band as i found the pressure a tad too tight. one ear phone snapped off. Shame as they sounded pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Carruthers

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: absolutley brilliant headphones. Got these free with a magazine and have had them for a good few months now. Product still shows no sign of wear and tear. Product is very comfortable, light and has great sound (bass can be lacking at times). There is a decent amount of noise isolation meaning I could easily listen to music on a plane and train. Mic is of very good quality for a simple in-line cable which can be detached whenever you want. I use this for both music and gaming as I love them so much. These would make a great present for someone or yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cigan

customer_reviews.title: Nice wood. Bad everything else.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair because they looked nice. The sound quality isn't the best and after just one morning's use the left ear piece sheared off with very little pressure. The wood is well crafted, but that where it stops because the rest a cheap low grade finish. I'm not at all happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Sant

customer_reviews.title: Get something else
customer_reviews.text: The sound is ok, but the cheap plastic holding the speakers to the headband breaks too easily, basically making the speaker fall off. The cable also makes an unreliable connection for the microphone. I got these for free with a wired magazine subscription; glad I didn't pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: another cheap product by griffin
customer_reviews.text: Bad headphones. Cheap sound, cheap made. There's far better products for this price. One star for the look.
customer_reviews.author: Artek

product_meta.title: Griffin GC36503 WoodTones Over the Ear Headphones for Smartphones and MP3 Devices, Beech
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Wood Tones enclosures are so lightweight, and the plush ear pads are so comfortable, you can wear them for extended periods without fatigue, and a listening experience isolated from outside distractions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.8 out of 5 stars45 ratings2.8 out of 5 stars
